name: archive_manager
description: Create or extract ZIP archives within the project workspace.

action.description: Choose 'zip' to create an archive or 'unzip' to extract an existing archive.

archive_path.description: Path to the archive file. Required for both actions.

source_paths.description: List of files to include when creating a zip archive.

extract_to.description: Directory where the archive should be extracted.

overwrite.description: When extracting, allow overwriting files if true.
